sen.j: 後一条天皇（ごいちじょうてんのう、寛弘5年9月11日（1008年10月12日） - 長元9年4月17日（1036年5月15日））は、平安時代中期の第68代天皇（在位1016年 - 1036年）。
sen.e: Emperor GO-ICHIJO (October 12th, 1008 - May 15th, 1036) was the 68th Emperor during middle Heian Period. (His reign was 1016 - 1036)

sen.j: 道長の娘で叔母にあたる藤原威子を中宮とし、この時代には珍しく他の妃を持たなかったが、皇子女は内親王二人のみで世継ぎの皇子にはついに恵まれぬまま、29歳の若さで崩御した。
sen.e: He had FUJIWARA no Ishi as a second consort of an emperor, who was Michinaga's daughter and the Emperor's aunt, it was unusual during this time for the Emperor not to have other Empress, he only had two Princesses and did not have any Prince who was going to be a successor of the Imperial throne, the Emperor died young when he was twenty nine years old.

He had FUJIWARA no Ishi as the Emperor's second consort, she being Michinaga's daughter and the Emperor's aunt; it was unusual during this time for the Emperor not to have other empresses, but he had only two princesses and did not have any prince who could succeed to the Imperial Throne; the Emperor died young, at the age of 29.
